body:

- Allows users to select images matching only specific platform (#234)
- Bump of multiple libraries

name: v0.34.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Support docker buildx builder by @cppforlife in https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/carvel-kbld/pull/244 ([docs](https://carvel.dev/kbld/docs/v0.34.0/config/#docker-buildx))
* Prevent appending duplicate preresolved origins by @DennisDenuto in https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/carvel-kbld/pull/252

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/vmware-tanzu/carvel-kbld/compare/v0.33.0...v0.34.0

```

name: v0.33.0
body:
# :sparkles: What's new
- Add ARM 64 binaries for Windows and Linux
- Allow disabling origins annotation and aggressively redact git remote URL #232
- Make functions public to enable kbld to be consumed as a library #219
- Add `--unresolved-inspect` flag to display the list of images in a manifest without retrieving the SHA #156

# :speaker: Callouts
Thanks to
- @jpmcb
- @danielhelfand

For helping out with this release

# :open_file_folder: Files Checksum

```
181ac8be5652b54344617d90aa8e83fbb41756d1b4b99168fec85d8813b3c1b2  ./kbld-darwin-amd64

acbde20887239e383d23282ff7d4b017d248f28b7d2097043fed6b4387975723  ./kbld-darwin-arm64
e51a2bc092b69ae125f17b4f80edd78732f6927aa9a80cefd25f7f2f4af17565  ./kbld-windows-arm64.exe
```

name: v0.32.0
body:
# :sparkles: What's new
- [Docs] Add details for running the end to end test suite. (#187)
- [Testing] Add host-only-cidr option when launching minikube for testing (#189)
- Update Go to version 1.17 #173 
- Bumps several dependencies

# :speaker: Callouts
Thanks to
- Nicholas Seemiller @seemiller 

For helping out with this release

# :open_file_folder: Files Checksum

name: v0.31.0
body:
# :sparkles: What's new
- Renamed "metas" to "origins" within `kbld.k14s.io/images` annotation (**Breaking Change**) #169 
- Add Bazel builder ([docs](https://carvel.dev/kbld/docs/latest/config/#bazel)) #128 
- Include image metas (now known as "origins") in output when provided by imgpkg lock file #113

# :speaker: Callouts
Thanks to
- @cliuj — for contributing the Bazel builder

# :open_file_folder: Files Checksum
```

```

name: v0.30.0
body:
# :sparkles: What's new
- Upgrade vendir dependency to 0.17.0 #106 
- :scream: Mark the commands `package`, `unpackage` and `relocate` as deprecated #92 
  We recommend users to use [imgpkg](https://carvel.dev/imgpkg) to do the above operations

# :bug: Bug Fixes
- Manifest searching stops recursing below any key named `image` #109 

# :open_file_folder: Files Checksum

```

c179590383de95967c5704eb206c0e695f133ff60b2fe70c8d62ad4ac4920ec9  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

body:

- Allow using [ko](https://github.com/google/ko) for building is now supported #37 

# :speaker: Callouts
Thanks to
- Ben Moss @benmoss for contributing the ko PR

For helping out with this release

name: v0.28.0
body:
# :sparkles: What's new
 - Support for new format of imgpkg ImagesLock file
    For more information about ImagesLock check https://carvel.dev/kbld/docs/latest/resolving/#generating-resolution-imgpkg-lock-output
 - buildkit-cli-for-kubectl builder support (#63)
 - Allow option to enable buildkit when building images with docker #81
 - support image override to pick latest version based on semver constrain #51
# :speaker: Callouts
Thanks to
- Dustin Deus(@StarpTech) making our test suite more resilient
- Andrew Wittrock(@Birdrock) and Andrew Costa(@acosta11) for buildkit option when using docker

```
4962a56a755fb3f12678d1024007bcf87485e350b031924d5f24c3361e7dd7f9  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
3174e5b42286aab4359d2bc12a85356ba520744fd4e26d6511fb8d705e7170c3  ./kbld-linux-amd64
654c39530fd38fbe8415ab7f11da2fd7a545b0af8db7580b0f7e75439a163fc5  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

body:

name: v0.26.0
body:
- Support applying user provided tags when pushing image ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/develop/docs/config.md#imagedestinations))
  - Thanks to @StarpTech 
- Do not set executable perm for the lock file
  - Thanks @ciriarte 

```

```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.25.0
body:
- Add `--registry-insecure` flag to work with HTTP registry endpoints
- Deduplicate and prune out null annotations
  - Thanks for @jbrunton
- Swallow dup close file error during unpackage command

```
6416225ed6b66b4aad7ff3637c5bbd0930a8e2c4644b3cd4218eb40923586813  ./kbld-darwin-amd64

```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.24.0
body:
- Improve retry behaviour for package command when downloading layers
- Make git errors more descriptive
- Sort URLs in images annotation
  - Thanks to @jbrunton 

```
480f45f62bad6af0518884f2e6234b0655fa30cc533dc9a4c336ea9376db2b16  ./kbld-darwin-amd64

```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.23.0
body:
- Added relocate command to support image relocation between two registries ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/develop/docs/packaging.md))
  - This is effectively combination of pkg/unpkg with an optimization to avoid writing out tar locally
- Improve connection reuse during relocation/pkg/unpkg

```
4414bac258a53b62224ee50a50624dfd3b136e9e5a4170134d20917f6e11678a  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
2367d6376c2d3a5a08d6d780d9721829abbfee13d3e9301271b166e90e472d15  ./kbld-linux-amd64
f0e00f20e667b8e19ca24ad8ddb88c047da02071a06bbedb86f128e4ec62cd93  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.22.0
body:
- Support multiple YAML documents with yaml update strategy
- Support overriding custom image search rule
- Improve authentication functionality with registries

```
ee5f7271883fe8dc10128c31bacecbce29a23a492ee7d06393d11690c3b4da4b  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
eb888079b26330e71b855c3f37c8b81fe55125b9a6e26a43e9eeabfd016051d6  ./kbld-linux-amd64
6cbded65da43fad0f46e4f2017349ab594e8755567f24013941c971dc5ab37c6  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.21.0
body:
- Parallelize `package/unpackage` commands
  - Exposed via `--concurrency` flag, defaults to 5
- Support packaging of lock files (by including preresolved image overrides)
- Support `--lock-output` flag for unpackage command
- Print kbld errors on multiple lines where appropriate
- Add `yaml` and `json` update strategies for search rules ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#config-1))
- Support `path` in key matcher for search rules ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#config-1))

```
52d0aed99a78eeb78bb5a4ade850391b294a87f5bae4493392f2c09fbe836e96  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
618f7e97389d75ae65c73cdad7a068d1f5b22e296042992c8498d0e16e727f78  ./kbld-linux-amd64
b8f9633805c87866d89198e4559e439786f455f586088a699831b402906e425d  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.20.0
body:
- `kbld package` will no longer error for images that use non-distributable layers (e.g. windows base layer)
  - such layers will simply be referenced but not relocated (they cannot be relocated without changing image digest, and possibly violating licenses)

```
3b6b9a66c1307cae48fdf066b6b713550ad5db7cdb41c3bdefffb92a486ae3d7  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
a0e7dd4072587aa26db59a74bb2aadeee55ab5d285dd0544cb8eaff11821ed33  ./kbld-linux-amd64
b979016e797a467d9058f9c81d1843dca1c5314625a7bd70f07936b464c9b9dd  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.19.0
body:
- Allow duplicate search rules (useful for using existing kbld configuration plus lock output)
- Prune out duplicate search rules in lock output

```
f4462851c406699fe6189e39c30889dddf79275a9aeab4a4eef767c98374771b  ./kbld-darwin-amd64

409fbe6331e721690a1c9b3072e4fa4e70df3da1feb9ef1fd73932a63a226d2d  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.18.0
body:
- Introduced `searchRules` configuration that allows more advanced image reference searching ([docs](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#config-1))

```
39751dc1b2cae5c9f64f342732083ae503bd5e8d44a6b3ffeaeb3ac3b97fdb4c  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
d949a139b0fe803ff2fafa4ff96bc49917eeda88f79516ebf34617b872ce19ec  ./kbld-linux-amd64

```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.17.0
body:
- Introduce new flag `--lock-output` for main command to capture resolved images as ImageOverrides

```

```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.16.0
body:
- Ensure that all generated docker tags are smaller than 128 chars (even for long repos)

```
9616c60eb18c3f9e79f02c7e3a6aa9b8c48c1f73922ce993a09895fd67fd51e1  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
964d5542b811abbc430aa54d4bc805e2d8ce5a9dbf5cadc01c4b107a50c1424e  ./kbld-linux-amd64
fef2fc0ba279db0aa8750d2df9125cb4461dbcefcd2ec8c98eaafc57a238ffdb  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.15.0
body:
- Support image matching by repo (ignoring tag/digest) ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#matching-images))
- Support minimum required version checking via config ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#config-1))

```
e9442199a127877681bf70200d69d0e2d15cf061801e5b9998473ee5c144a712  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
396f02f1d9f320cf5089c19aa9c5d014949cfba8d6029a562fe73212bc483db4  ./kbld-linux-amd64
45397a120ed645b20e8f6ceee0b0a99693505cb280de0b37aaa8d262d68da934  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.14.0
body:
- Resolve image references twice to ensure that registry returns same digest
  - Some older registries just make up a digest -- want to catch such cases and fail
- Improve error messages from `unpackage` command
- Add `--version` in addition to version cmd

```
1da8bd208e49a1faeb48b167ba5fc69b10b94b74c0e6289bd0adbe043f524b4f  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
9946ae1c154be0dfa301e316cf4403d6961096a79458656df5eba634f4c9250c  ./kbld-linux-amd64
8696c0bab0c315616aefa58b0c84cebf71d39fef55f7b6cd73169901a4477dbb  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.13.0
body:
- Add ImageKeys config to support image URLs from keys beside `image` key ([doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#imagekeys))
- Disable CGO and make builds reproducible

```
62d3201b31e7f78ae3d6c1d0621aeb21a59be94bd990811e8af28b61f9ec86c1  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
c5dc9a5e2fc1795f64f674cbc528a28c269432ce9485ee4dc74d8d18890dd4be  ./kbld-linux-amd64
744dce9fae5adacd77cd8b46415110f3b07b23084b35d1038faf68a9ec0c03ad  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.12.0
body:
- Added support for pack CLI builder (https://github.com/buildpack/pack)
  - See [Configuration doc](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#sources) for details
- Always start output with `---` YAML document separator

```
2ca30f9e60c8fdcbec109fb73e61568e806c4c6620d9fd1ec0d0dd9b654aec50  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
f2f8b1882f51a6d3434d59b9622eb651487a06e8bcbac14401914e7e2a726ba3  ./kbld-linux-amd64
d7b7326871845d72a9cc82da82d759f18cc8e1073c0b60b2b6d4ceb5cf6e46a9  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.11.0
body:
- Added `--image-map-file` flag to read CNAB image relocation mapping file

```
f2e231877f86830e2324f189235c2788c54a865cc00b427694272d8967cd23ba  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
1029110ffa0263fb75a9deb25642f577bb9d5ee25b1a5b10db55310e05388569  ./kbld-linux-amd64
3f33882b46404da41163ecf3199812f90f0022cb26007397d5c625588f572923  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.10.0
body:
- Add `preresolved` option to `ImageOverrides` ([docs]( https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#imageoverrides)) (per request: https://kubernetes.slack.com/archives/CH8KCCKA5/p1564524082059800)
- Add docker build options to `Sources` ([docs](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/config.md#sources))

```
a712ce9e5782f64e3b0e972651405d9ea22589ca8aac3be544337b04727ca2cc  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
56a0ba05431d3e5e4da0da710ba0b7ce98a7f848c15509359da2e58d451cae72  ./kbld-linux-amd64
ead0bcc5036cc53f5daedee4f5ee6bdcf12c92dca3d7dcdde93c079ce8f34829  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.9.0
body:
- Added `--registry-verify-certs=bool` flag (defaults to true) to enable/disable certificate verification when contacting registry
  - Requested by @stang to support talking to non-secured registries within cluster ([slack thread](https://kubernetes.slack.com/archives/CH8KCCKA5/p1562834349455900))

```
a81a21fea239a6114951ccbf76a31ca20850b8c4c453a661e7ce6575137016b7  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
18164a1738348fb4366f9d18955b5cad0e61b1b656d718780cc8fbdb6587465f  ./kbld-linux-amd64
c76c17b03baeb6e6333e0c8c7fbb661abde46f40e0afdc41a8cb8f3cd48b383c  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.8.0
body:
- Fixed issues with git repo detection when running outside of a git repo

```
83ea3564f5d880ca5bf61d4ae9e1c5d7f7b0300a2986723e98572036a8218eac  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
4a94e7ed7627b2fde0d21e4a4ba3043f8a490586ab1c3a92f371c45226c1fcad  ./kbld-linux-amd64
68b9e28a8dc9c8a54d6c391c475f509a97b7b6ebee0c5f1166ba19e95e0938e2  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.7.0
body:
- Add `kbld.k14s.io/images` annotation to resources that includes metadata about how image was resolved (records original image URL and tag), and possibly built (records Git and local directory information)
- Add `inspect` command to list images and if possible metadata about them
  - metadata comes from `kbld.k14s.io/images` annotation

```
a8b449b74d797048798d484e2e4a7671f730e7c9702414f9f7e3cead837ab4db  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
a67eb6eeeff63ac77d34c2c86b0a3fa97f69a9d3f8c9d34c20036fa79cb4214d  ./kbld-linux-amd64
a31a89e68b1acde97181187397460d1e2752785ab9572440cf18e8a4e550ccd3  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

(Installation instructions: https://k14s.io/#install-from-github-release)

name: v0.6.0
body:
- [breaking] Remove `-R` flag, and allow use of directories by default
- Add `list` command to list referenced images
- Add a tag when pushing to registry to work better with registries that try to garbage collect non-tagged images
  - Tag is not meant to be useful to humans (e.g. `kbld-rand-<timestamp>-<rand>` => `kbld-rand-1557783001400690000-5024985154169`)
- Remove temporary Docker tag to clean up `docker images` list

```
4d3df3e83a86be73413f8dc788778ce6e603aa0efa1ccb35c6e0cc1efb725ced  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
605ae37ee1b2f38883b4e55614415d3798161e9eb766088a3504aa707d9cd4ff  ./kbld-linux-amd64
f4adfa241916c7ebc1833c672927861f7f5d8e2f3c34804cf1f01a10670665df  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

name: v0.5.0
body:
- `unpkg` command changes
  - Tag imported images with `kbld-sha256-...` to make imports possible in AWS ECR ([details](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/packaging.md#authenticating-to-aws-ecr))
  - Add `--registry-ca-cert-path` flag to allow use with custom CAs (used commonly with Harbor)

```
ac243ec6149c9df7843c978eb530e05b00ebeafd905799e33abf630adf2923eb  ./kbld-darwin-amd64
e82867e73444ed83627de198124cff29ce46a3b3d304fa54b005596ae605f2b5  ./kbld-linux-amd64
81d9b0c9248b4e4497d1d147c4e43ca7c9b8a663344f6236f230999b15eb4f27  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

name: v0.4.0
body:
- Retry writing images and indexes in `unpkg` command
- Improve error message when image cannot be retrieved during packaging
- Improve [packaging docs](https://github.com/k14s/kbld/blob/master/docs/packaging.md)

```
6aa3deefd419daf93bc0f9a4c36f9f5a087b3412ca676b2fce6e42b02d863150  ./kbld-darwin-amd64

ef8cc0e9912eaece281f6736942f7d5636f728e779831f3ce9ac02defe9c1e56  ./kbld-windows-amd64.exe
```

name: v0.3.0
body:
- Added `pkg` and `unpkg` commands for packaging container images and importing into different registries

```

body:
- Switch from `kbld apply` to just `kbld`

name: v0.1.0 - Initial release
body:
- Able to resolve image reference to digests using registry API
- Able to use Docker to orchestrate Docker build and push
